disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.description:
## ⚠️ Alternative Time Systems - Disclaimer

The alternative calendars and time systems provided by this integration are for **educational and entertainment purposes only**.

### Please note:
• The calculations might not be 100% accurate
• Some calendars are fictional or theoretical
• Historical calendars may have variations
• Time zones and conversions are approximations

### Found an issue?
If you discover any errors or have suggestions for improvements, please report them on our GitHub repository:

**https://github.com/Lexorius/alternative_time**

By continuing, you acknowledge that these time systems should not be used for critical time-keeping or official purposes.
